name: cat_vod_nodejs_fastify

scripts._build: rimraf dist && node esbuild.js && node esbuild-config.js
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run _build && node copyDist.js D:\soft\猫影视\Release\data\flutter_assets\asset\js
scripts.build:copy: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run _build && node copyDist.js D:\soft\猫影视\Release\data\flutter_assets\asset\js
scripts.build:dbg:copy: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run _build && node copyDist.js D:\soft\猫影视\Release\data\flutter_assets\asset\js
scripts.build:rollup(obsolete): rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node rollup.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node rollup-config.js
scripts.build-old:dbg:copy: rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node esbuild.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node esbuild-config.js && node copyDist.js D:\soft\猫影视\Release\data\flutter_assets\asset\js

author: 道长
description:
道长修仙，法力无边。一统江湖，只需半年。
君子袒蛋蛋，小人藏鸡鸡。
